title: Game occasionally minimizes because of windows powershell
body:
On random moments during the game, like once a day or so, my game alt+tabs out automatically and I see the icon of Windows Powershell appearing in my taskbar.

I don't know much about informatics and I don't know what Windows Powershell does. Can I just remove it or does it do something important on the background? Does anyone know a solution for this?

I use windows 10.

replies.body: Especially prone on a a work computer, you could have tasks scheduled getting in the way.  Otherwise, we actually a list of steps in our [FPS issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3)guide which will provide instructions on clean booting and getting rid of unwanted programs.  Hope that helps!
